Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Founded in January 1985, with a registered capital of 935 million yuan, Lizhu Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. is a comprehensive pharmaceutical group company integrating pharmaceutical research and development, production and sales, with more than 8,000 employees, and a listed company on A+H shares.In FY2022, the company's operating revenue was 12.63 billion yuan, with a net profit of 1.909 billion yuan, and an investment of 1.401 billion yuan in research and development.
 
Lizhu has been making breakthroughs in the fields of APIs, chemical drugs, traditional Chinese medicines, biological drugs, in vitro diagnostic reagents, etc. Its products are distributed in the fields of digestion, cardiovascular and cerebral vascular, reproductive endocrine, and psychiatric/neurological. The company continues to focus on the main business of innovative drugs and high-barrier complex formulations, launching heavyweight products such as leucovorin and eplazole, and realizing volume growth in the fields of digestion and reproduction.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Medical experiment data, medical education data
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, Africa, North America, South America, Europe, Australia (continent), Antarctica
